description:
In the mysterious outer space, a brand new alien villain has appeared! Wise Goat and Lilly Goat reappear with brand new characters, inventions and plots, how should the goats resolve the crisis this time?
Before the couple was frozen by the Bacteria King, they teleported Ice Ice Sheep to the green grassland to seek shelter from Weslie. Unexpectedly, the Bacteria King chased them to the grassland in order to unseal their ability and manipulated Grey Wolf to catch Ice Ice Sheep. At the critical moment, fortunately, all the little sheep arrived in time to obtain the energy of the Super Magic Cube and save the Ice Ice Sheep. However, in the face of the new partners recruited by the Bacteria King, all the sheep and wolves have to fight with him to protect Ice Ice Sheep and help him find his brother. With all the twists and turns, how will Weslie rescue his trapped parents?
source: bgm.tv/deepl

BAIDU_BAIKE: 喜羊羊与灰太狼之奇趣外星客

titles.title: Xi Yang Yang Yu Hui Tailang: Qiqu Waixing Ke
喜羊羊與灰太狼之奇趣外星客
